00024 void
00025 GenericLink::setup()
00026 {
00027     name = "link";
00028     address = myId();
00029     node_ip = 0;
00030     flits_passed= 0;
00031     credits_passed=0;
00032 }
00033 
00034 void
00035 GenericLink::process_event ( IrisEvent* e )
00036 {
00037     switch(e->type)
00038     {
00039         case LINK_ARRIVAL_EVENT:
00040             handle_link_arrival_event(e);
00041             break;
00042         default:
00043             cout << " Unk event type at link " << endl;
00044             break;
00045     }
00046 
00047     return ;
00048 }               /* -----  end of function GenericLink::process_event  ----- */
00049 
00050 void
00051 GenericLink::handle_link_arrival_event( IrisEvent* e)
00052 {
00053     LinkArrivalData* data = static_cast<LinkArrivalData*>(e->event_data.at(0));
00054 
00055 #ifdef _DEBUG
00056     _DBG("handle_link_arrival_event vc: %d src_id: %d dest: %d, data type: %d", data->vc, e->src_id, e->dst_id, data->type);
00057 #endif
00058 
00059     if(e->src_id == input_connection->address)
00060     {
00061         /* Update stats */
00062         flits_passed++;
00063 
00064         EventId uid = Simulator::Schedule( Simulator::Now()+ 0.75, &NetworkComponent::process_event, output_connection, e);
00065 //        cout << " inseid link: " << uid.time << " " << uid.uid << " " << uid.nextUID;
00066     }
00067     else
00068     {
00069         /* Update stats */
00070         credits_passed++;
00071         Simulator::Schedule( Simulator::Now()+ 0.75, &NetworkComponent::process_event, input_connection, e);
00072     }
00073 }
00074 
00075 string
00076 GenericLink::toString () const
00077 {
00078     stringstream str;
00079     str << "GenericLink: "
00080         << "\taddress: " << address;
00081     if(input_connection)
00082         str << "\tinput_connection: " << static_cast<NetworkComponent*>(input_connection)->address;
00083     if(output_connection)
00084         str << "\toutput_connection: " << static_cast<NetworkComponent*>(output_connection)->address;
00085     
00086     return str.str();
00087 }               /* -----  end of function GenericLink::toString  ----- */
00088 
00089 string
00090 GenericLink::print_stats() const
00091 {
00092     stringstream str;
00093     str << endl << toString()
00094         << "\n link[" << address << "] Link Utilization for Flits: " << flits_passed/max_sim_time
00095         << "\n link[" << address << "] Credit utilization for Flits: " << credits_passed/max_sim_time
00096         << ". " << endl;
00097 
00098     return str.str();
00099 }
00100 
00101 ullint
00102 GenericLink::get_flits_utilization()
00103 {
00104     return flits_passed;
00105 }
